gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bucks 115, Nets 108
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bucks have now won three of four as they defeated the Nets, 115-108. Damian Lillard (30 points, 12 assists, five 3PM) and Giannis Antetokounmpo (21 points, nine rebounds, five assists, two blocks) led the Bucks as Mikal Bridges led the Nets with 24 points and six rebounds in the loss. The Bucks move to 45-25 as the Nets go to 26-44.
